title: Mantra Herbal Solutions Products Now Being Sold on CompleteBeautyStore.com
text:
Mantra Herbal Solutions, which develops a line of Ayurvedic personal care products geared toward globally conscious consumers, announced its products are now available for purchase on CompleteBeautyStore.com, a popular beauty and health products website. Mantra’s products are based on a century of research by the company’s scientific group, BRF, which has spent a significant amount of time analyzing Ayurveda, its benefits and how it has been used in various holistic health regimens throughout history. Ayurveda is frequently referred to as the “science of life,” and has a 5,000 year legacy that began with the Sages, who had a deep knowledge of the natural world. Mantra’s modern spin on Ayurveda is embodied in these products, which are now available to a greater amount of customers than ever before.
“We are excited to announce Mantra Herbal products can now be purchased on CompleteBeautyStore.com,” said Archie Reddy of Mantra Herbal Solutions. “There are so many people who can improve their lives thanks to the natural benefits of these products, and we can’t wait to offer them to a wider base of customers.”
Mantra is particularly adept at ensuring all products follow the natural guidelines inherent to Ayurveda. The products contain no synthetic chemicals, additives or preservatives, only making use of potent and effective active Ayurvedic ingredients. The products were designed with fully-approved GMP processes and facilities and have been put through a number of dermatological tests by volunteers. All the products are also registered with the FDA under its voluntary compliance program, ensuring they meet the strictest guidelines possible for personal care products.
The company also makes sure the packaging of the products is natural. It is all free of animal products and recyclable. The line of products includes moisturizers, cleansers, creams, shampoos, conditioners, sun creams, massage oils, body washes and other products.
“Our goal is to be mindful of the environment and to develop a natural, responsible product that earth-conscious consumers can truly appreciate,” said Reddy. “We can’t wait to continue making a difference in people’s lives with these products, thanks to this new sales partnership with CompleteBeautyStore.com.”
To learn more about Mantra Herbal Solutions and its wide range of products, please visit http://www.mantraherbal.com .
